note: Writer and self-published author of novels and literary non-fiction. Presently labouring on my work in progress provisionally titled 'Innocence'. Residing again in Canada after living and working in over 15 different countries, left-leaning, concerned about the environment and wildlife, social issues, religious fanaticism, the misuse of AI and facial recognition, and the growth of the drug trade. I'm an OAP, not odious and putrid but an old age pensioner living with my cat and best buddy Sparky.
